channel.title: Need a little help
channel.description:
i need a little help with attacking monsters on my server.
i spawn them and then when i attack them with either attack or magic my cleint crashes with the error
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1573) at client.method146(client.java:12228) at client.method102(client.java:8061) at client.method9(client.java:8936) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4655) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)[/code]
ty.
edit: there all it the npc.cfg btw and are all set correctly.

item.title: Need a little help
item.dc:creator: @_devil_666 (devil)666
item.description:
@_devil_666 wrote:

i need a little help with attacking monsters on my server.

i spawn them and then when i attack them with either attack or magic my cleint crashes with the error

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1573) at client.method146(client.java:12228) at client.method102(client.java:8061) at client.method9(client.java:8936) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4655) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)
